document.full_text: youngsters mikaela shiffrin and colby granstrom turned in smooth performances in sloppy conditions sunday to win slalom titles at the u.s. championships.
document.title: shiffrin, granstrom win slalom titles at nationals
lines_and_colors: youngsters mikaela shiffrin and colby granstrom turned in smooth performances in sloppy conditions sunday to win slalom titles at the u.s. championships.
